Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not enough for a movie to be righteous. It must also be watchable

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of us do not consciously look at movies

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: Every great film should seem new every time you see it

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: I think most people are more susceptible to prejudice than to reason

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we have to get beyond the idea that we have to categorize people

Quote.Author: Roger Ebert
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of glad the web is sort of totally anarchic. That's fine with me

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very positive thinker, and I think that is what helps me the most in difficult moments

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: When you do something best in life, you don't really want to give that up - and for me it's tennis

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I don't only play for the record books

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: I have learnt to be even more patient

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: But so far I have the feeling that the chances are there to repeat last year's season

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: Early in my career, I struggled with consistency, but I couldn't get more consistent than this year

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't stay No. 1 for fifty years, you know. We'll see what happens

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel a bit awkward playing in a red shirt out at Wimbledon. But I don't dislike it

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't always agree on everything

Quote.Author: Roger Federer
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a husband is for me as big a priority as being a father

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: My father believed in toughness, honesty, politeness and being on time. All very important lessons

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact of the matter is that most actors are shy people

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Creating a character on or off the stage is an escape

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a mixture of idealist and realist

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like bungee jumping, but I do like skiing

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I think arriving at or departing from any airport in America is just horrendous these days

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sorry to say that no, I do not play the piano

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Some are blessed with musical ability, others with good looks. Myself, I was blessed with modesty

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: I never liked guns, I hate them, I always blink before they go off

Quote.Author: Roger Moore
Quote.QuoteValue: Working with UNICEF made me grow up and recognize how fortunate I am

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: In any team sport, the best teams have consistency and chemistry

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning isn't getting ahead of others. It's getting ahead of yourself

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence comes from hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: As a part owner, I'm going to be not only an admirer... but a nervous wreck

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: Discrimination is a disease

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a lot of people who touch the customer

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: It's okay to have personal ambitions, but you have to take someone with you

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though they are paid differently, everyone has to feel appreciated

Quote.Author: Roger Staubach
Quote.QuoteValue: If NASCAR racing gets any more exciting, I may not be able to stand it

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: The general election is not an organizational exercise - it's a mass media exercise

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something urbane, stylish, and worldly about owning a cocktail shaker

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's be very clear, if you check the F.E.C. records you will see I am supporting George W. Bush

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I get blamed for things I have nothing to do with

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Unless you can fake sincerity, you'll get nowhere in this business

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics with me isn't theater. It's performance art. Sometimes, for its own sake

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody ever built a statue to a committee

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have to drag somebody to register, they're not highly motivated

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: In this business, if you don't pay your debts you're finished

Quote.Author: Roger Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Big brother listening in on your phone calls - I got a problem with that

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Real patriotism is a willingness to challenge the government when it's wrong

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: When one gets in bed with government, one must expect the diseases it spreads

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: You wanna get rid of drug crime in this country? Fine, let's just get rid of all the drug laws

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: War is never economically beneficial except for those in position to profit from war expenditures

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Setting a good example is a far better way to spread ideals than through force of arms

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Legitimate use of violence can only be that which is required in self-defense

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Our country's founders cherished liberty, not democracy

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Capitalism should not be condemned, since we haven't had capitalism

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: 1913 wasn't a very good year. 1913 gave us the income tax, the 16th amendment and the IRS

Quote.Author: Ron Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Have you noticed the debt is exploding? And it's not all because of Medicare

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody could say anything they want about me, and it literally never penetrates my skin

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: I do live like a rock star, but it's not as great as it sounds. It's a lot of traveling

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather do a really good small part than a really bad big part

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't get where I am today by worryin' about how I'd feel tomorrow

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was about 12 years old back in Houston, my Dad used to take us to the driving range

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that a bad Super Bowl halftime show is still better than a soccer game

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: You wanna get the truth out of me, get me hammered

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to stay sharp is to do live shows. There is no part-time comedy

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: Diamonds - that'll shut her up... for a minute!

Quote.Author: Ron White
Quote.QuoteValue: The next time you have a thought... let it go

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: Look at my face. Does it look like I can take a good hit?

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: Even if they don't know it, everyone has the instinct to survive

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to learn to take my time in MMA, and I was just able to keep a clear head

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's a camera on me or off me, it's roughly the same, just a lot less energy

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: Being an athlete, you try to get protein

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: Where is women's sports prominently displayed with the men? Tennis is the only thing I can think of

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: I lost a lot of judo matches because of points fighters. It was extremely frustrating for me

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe me, there's nothing I would like to do more than disappear for a while

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a terrible singer, but I'm not shy about it. I'm shy about dancing

Quote.Author: Ronda Rousey
Quote.QuoteValue: Bartending took the romanticism out of drinking

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: So don't get me wrong, I love my songs, and I still love hearing them. That's history, baby

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: My honeymoon night was spent on the floor in the bathroom with my mother

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: When I do a concert and people put their hands in the air, they're doing it on their own

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, they're just up there for the money, just packaged and be gone

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: The people need to feel the music

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: Stage performing is a dying art form

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: No one has their own identity like the Ronettes did back in the day

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of the groups I worked with 30 years ago are either dead or dead broke. And it's a shame

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: Kill Rock Stars allowed me to put out a real genuine rock 'n' roll record

Quote.Author: Ronnie Spector
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Behind the Music is good for people like Leif Garrett and Motley Crue

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Prosperity tries the fortunate, adversity the great

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not like candid pictures. They are so unattractive

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Neither comprehension nor learning can take place in an atmosphere of anxiety

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing I like less than bad arguments for a view that I hold dear

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: More business is lost every year through neglect than through any other cause

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had an exciting time; I married for love and got a little money along with it

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like old wine. They don't bring me out very often - but I'm well preserved

Quote.Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: No one will ever feel sorry for me

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: Women complain about PMS, but I think of it as the only time of the month when I can be myself

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: Excuse the mess but we live here

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: It's okay to be fat. So you're fat. Just be fat and shut up about it

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: I know how to do anything, I'm a mom

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: Birth control that really works - every night before we go to bed we spend an hour with our kids

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: Imitation is the sincerest form of show business

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: You kind of restructure your whole personality to be in a healthy relationship

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: I meditate so I know how to find a peaceful place within to be calm and peaceful

Quote.Author: Roseanne Barr
Quote.QuoteValue: My real life is funnier than anything on TV

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: If you see a snake, just kill it - don't appoint a committee on snakes

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: Eagles don't flock, you have to find them one at a time

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: If someone as blessed as I am is not willing to clean out the barn, who will?

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: Written reports stifle creativity

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody can cut prices, but it takes brains to produce a better article

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: Which one of the three candidates would you want your daughter to marry?

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: Inventories can be managed, but people must be led

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: Failures are like skinned knees, painful but superficial

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: A weak currency is the sign of a weak economy, and a weak economy leads to a weak nation

Quote.Author: Ross Perot
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to be the biggest to beat the biggest

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean I can do it when I'm very relaxed, and with good friends, then I think I can be amusing

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nope, I don't enjoy work generally. Not because I'm lazy; it's just all so stressful and worrying

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to express myself in a different way. I have a performing inclination

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: You're about as useful as a one-legged man at an arse kicking contest

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: But generally speaking, I tend to be quiet and introspective

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a bit disconcerting being treated like Madonna

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always worried about things more than I should

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: But I always feel that whatever I do, I could do better. I suppose it is perfectionism

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself more of a visual comedian than a physical one

Quote.Author: Rowan Atkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more critical of the films I make than anyone else

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: It's about time law enforcement got as organized as organized crime

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a free market Republican. I am against subsidies, in most cases

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: Change is not a destination, just as hope is not a strategy

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: When you confront a problem you begin to solve it

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: Revenge is not a noble sentiment, but it is a human one

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaders need to be optimists. Their vision is beyond the present

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: You never agree with any one candidate 100 percent. I don't agree with myself 100 percent

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: The danger to a black child in America is not a white police officer. The danger is another black

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: St. Paul's Chapel stands - without so much as a broken window. Little miracle

Quote.Author: Rudy Giuliani
Quote.QuoteValue: In choosing Governor Sarah Palin as his running mate, John McCain has chosen for the future

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: Never look backwards or you'll fall down the stairs

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman is only a woman, but a good cigar is a smoke

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: Gardens are not made by singing 'Oh, how beautiful,' and sitting in the shade

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman's guess is much more accurate than a man's certainty

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: We have forty million reasons for failure, but not a single excuse

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's mind is wont to tell him more than seven watchmen sitting in a tower

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: Heaven grant us patience with a man in love

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: The first condition of understanding a foreign country is to smell it

Quote.Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote.QuoteValue: I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole point is to live life and be - to use all the colors in the crayon box

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: In our subconscious, we all know we're playing roles

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: I think this life is hard without assistance from others

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: Never forget that the most political thing you can ever do is follow your heart

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to remember that you're born naked, and the rest is drag

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: There are so many sensitive souls; they don't know what to do with their feelings

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: Drag is there to remind culture not to take itself too seriously. All of this is illusion

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to find your tribe

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's journey - it unfolds for you as you are ready for it

Quote.Author: RuPaul
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is dangerous. There are no guarantees

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I've ever tried to change anyone. I don't have the energy

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing the clarity that comes with psychotic jealousy

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: I was basically adventurous, I think I wanted to try everything

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to boarding school at seven and cried and cried

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: There's still a great deal of bias about homosexuality

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: I am at that age when you panic at the slightest thing

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been any good with authority

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been reduced to drag

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in Hollywood is like being in the Christian right these days

Quote.Author: Rupert Everett
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandfather was born in India and three generations of my family served there

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not an economist and we all know economists were created to make weather forecasters look good

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Bury your mistakes

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: The buck stops with the guy who signs the checks

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: I am amazed that CNN can't get its act together

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: I felt that it's best just to be as transparent as possible

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're a catalyst for change, you make enemies - and I'm proud of the ones I've got

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Our reputation is more important than the last hundred million dollars

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: My father left me with a clear sense that the media was something different

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: I think everyone's against abortion

Quote.Author: Rupert Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I resent is the slur that I just support political candidates because of the business

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: Capitalism is always evaluated against dreams. Utopia is a dream. It doesn't exist

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberals get credit for good intentions, and that's about it, because everything they do fails

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to tell you, every day is a roller coaster

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: Ronald Reagan was the greatest president of the twentieth century

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminism was established to allow unattractive women easier access to the mainstream

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: Character matters; leadership descends from character

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: Did you know that the White House drug test is multiple choice?

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: No nation ever taxed itself into prosperity

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: You know why there's a Second Amendment? In case the government fails to follow the first one

Quote.Author: Rush Limbaugh
Quote.QuoteValue: Football is like life and I know life

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Ah, summer, what power you have to make us suffer and like it

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try to make children grow up to be like you, or they may do it

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal of all inanimate objects is to resist man and ultimately defeat him

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst thing about being a tourist is having other tourists recognize you as a tourist

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: In America, it is sport that is the opiate of the masses

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to cars, only two varieties of people are possible - cowards and fools

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: In America nothing dies easier than tradition

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Except for politics, no business is scrutinized more exhaustively than journalism

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Journalism talk is part of the nonstop background noise of American life

Quote.Author: Russell Baker
Quote.QuoteValue: Serious journalism need not be solemn

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm into yoga, I meditate all the time, I'm vegetarian

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: My mum brought me up on her own. All we really had was each other

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: Honesty has always been an integral part of my operation, really

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll not be changing, but America will

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had this impulse to be destructive

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: I do have a regard for the musicality of language that came from BBC sitcoms like 'Fawlty Towers.'

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has their own mantra

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: As a person... I'm a little more doubtful, introspective and analytical

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: The bad-boy label is just an assumption

Quote.Author: Russell Brand
Quote.QuoteValue: Strength does not have to be belligerent and loud

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: People accuse me of being arrogant all the time. I'm not arrogant, I'm focused

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is no blood on the line, it is not rugby league

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: I have respect for beer

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing like sitting back and talking to your cows

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: God bless America. God save the Queen. God defend New Zealand and thank Christ for Australia

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: There has to be a mathematical explanation for how bad that tie is

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: Like everyone else, I've had moments when I've felt that I've been losing my grip

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: I respond in the moment which is what makes me a good actor

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't play chess with my life, ya' know

Quote.Author: Russell Crowe
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to play passionate women, but no one will let me

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: A covenant made with God should be regarded not as restrictive but as protective

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Eternal principles that govern happiness apply equally to all

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Obedience brings success; exact obedience brings miracles

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to take sorrow out of death is to take love out of life

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Our Heavenly Father loves you. He has created you to be successful and to have joy

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: To rule children by force is the technique of Satan, not of the Savior

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: A worthy woman personifies the truly noble and worthwhile attributes of life

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: My concern is that contention is becoming accepted as a way of life

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Prior to my call to the Twelve, I served as a medical doctor and surgeon

Quote.Author: Russell M. Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: The Lord has often chosen to instruct His people in their times of trial

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Surround yourself with people who are smarter than you

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Poverty and lack of knowledge must be challenged

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Judgment of the people in the situation is not helpful. How can you help them is the question

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Hip-hop is a voice for voiceless poor people

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm less afraid of failure than some others

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I think when you're very dedicated to something and you're engaged fully, you become a giver

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Art allows people a way to dream their way out of their struggle

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is a way to express yourself and through that you can escape a bad situation

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: If you learn late, you pass it on to people so they can learn early. It's a step process

Quote.Author: Russell Simmons
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to create businesses that I think are not hurtful

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother told me to be a lady. And for her, that meant be your own person, be independent

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: So that's the dissenter's hope: that they are writing not for today but for tomorrow

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: The state controlling a woman would mean denying her full autonomy and full equality

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Fight for the things that you care about, but do it in a way that will lead others to join you

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not women's liberation, it is women's and men's liberation

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: We had to go on and do the work of the court and we did

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: I would not look to the U.S. Constitution if I were drafting a constitution in 2012

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: You can disagree without being disagreeable

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Dissents speak to a future age

Quote.Author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
Quote.QuoteValue: Who will take responsibility for raising the next generation?

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: In really good times, you say, 'No, I'm not taking that ad.' But in bad times, you'll take anything

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret to life is finding joy in ordinary things. I'm interested in happiness

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: I love breakfast, and I don't see any reason it has to be cereal and eggs and toast

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to work. I believe that work helps us find our self worth
